mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter from Jennie Howard to Dr. Thomas Henry Howard Dated Dec. 27th 1868
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A letter from Jennie Howard, dated Dec. 27th 1868, in which she writes to her brother in law Dr. Howard concerning general news about weddings and Christmas. She says, "Christmas has been very dull so far only with children and negroes, they have a merry time." She goes on to implore Dr. Howard to visit, and entices him with mentions of several young ladies he might meet.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Courtship
